issue.title: [C++][Docs] Missing docs for many Datum members
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-13526](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-13526). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Many of the Datum members are missing documentation and don't show up in the API reference page <https://arrow.apache.org/docs/cpp/api/compute.html?highlight=datum#_CPPv4N5arrow5DatumE>

The missing members include array(), make_array(), etc.
